entryComment: The taste was surprisingly really nice, good crunch when double frying and a unusual orange flavor which fits really good to chicken. I am not sure what i did wrong as the sauce didnt thicken, it just smoked and therefore tasted extremly like vinegar and didnt stick that well to the chicken. Might try that again.

I had great hopes for chicken Piccata as it looked absolutely mouthwatering good, sadly the base-recipe was for my taste a tiny bit too sour and i was missing a more heavy flavor as that was completly missing even after adding parmessan. If those two negatives wouldn't exist, it'd probably be a 9

I dont know what i really expected here, i thought it'd be like a crunchy snack (as i made it in pretty small cubes and heavily seasoned) but all it was, was a mushy seasoned cube, maybe fry it next time and season it just lightly with salt but that definitely isnt the way to go.

Surprisingly tasty even tho im not a fan of tomatoes or Spinach. Personally i would change how the chicken itself is cooked and something i cant quiet pinpoint is missing flavorwise. Other than that very solid Recipe
